title: Morning exotic Tea - Melody Islands BIO - 100g
description: A fresh and spicy green tea for a cool morning

[Iniciar sesión](/es/login) [Registrate](/es/login-intermediate) It is not a tea but a warm morning melody made of notes of green tea, fruits and exotic herbs. This exotic tea is an invitation to faraway escape and travel to tropical islands where birds sing for us facing the sea at sunrise. Ingredients: China Sencha green tea, apple, hibiscus, China
